main.name: Alexandra Vick
main.description: Marketing, Public Relations and Web Developer with 7+ years of experience is seeking to use my executive management, collaborative team building, communications, and branding expertise to build organizational value for a forward-thinking organization
main.bio: I am Alexandra Vick, I am passionate about Marketing and making a difference at a company. I enjoy and thrive in the ability to think outside the box. My plan is world domination...one company at a time. ;)
main.contactmessage: Please contact me for any additional questions or comments

resume.skillmessage: Exceptionally creative and dependable Entry Level Web Developer with a stellar customer service record and superb work ethic. Broadly and deeply knowledgeable in a wide variety of computer languages as well as the principles and techniques of website construction and maintenance. Highly adept at conveying complex technical information to a variety of professional and lay audiences in a clear and understandable manner.

work.title: Public Relations and Marketing Director
work.description: Responsible for all Marketing Functions which include branding, corporate communications, product marketing and marketing communications strategies and programs for eliseo campus. Identifying and researching new revenue opportunities in current and potential markets. Identifying opportunities for increasing visibility, brand recognition and engagement with multiple audiences in current markets (investors, press, customers, users, strategic partners). Designing & managing the execution of integrated communications programs across multiple communications channels (print, digital, event, social). Soliciting & analyzing user feedback & directing the product development, support and marketing teams on ux/ui improvements. Developed the new brand slogan, personality, and advertising program that grew brand recognition.

work.title: Director of Business Development
work.description: Monitoring, analyzing, and improving the performance of all marketing initiatives and platforms.  Develop the custom cross-departmental business intelligence reporting, using Microsoft. Responsible for generating new contacts and sales leads. Identifying potential customers, maintaining a good relationship with company contacts, communicating new product or service developments to customers, making presentations, attending networking events, and following up new business opportunities.

testimonials.text: Easy to work with, hard worker, and the ability to deliver on time.
Fun and easy going. Always willing to help out!
